AcceptTermsAndConditionsScreen.title: Terms and Conditions
AcceptTermsAndConditionsScreen.text: By clicking 'Accept', you agree to our Terms And Conditions. You also agree that you are not a resident or citizen from one of the prohibited countries.
AuthenticationScreen.confirmLogout: Are you sure you'd like to log out? This will reset your cache and all local user settings
ConversionConfirmationScreen.infoBitcoin: Bitcoin amount is only approximate. It can vary by a small amount.
ConversionConfirmationScreen.infoDollar: Dollar amount is only approximate. It can vary by a small amount.
EarnScreen.availableTomorrow:
Come back tomorrow to continue earning sats while learning.

Or, click continue to keep learning without rewards.
EarnScreen.motivatingBadger: Dig your way through these lessons and earn as you learn
EarnScreen.defaultErrorMessage:
{errorMessage: string} Please try again later.
Or, click to continue to keep learning without rewards.
EarnScreen.customErrorMessage:
It looks like we've detected some unusual activity on your account. To ensure fair play for everyone, we're unable to offer rewards at this time.
You can still continue learning without rewards, or please try again later from a different connection.
EarnScreen.customMessages.invalidPhoneFo:
We're experiencing an attack from users with this telco.
We've disabled rewards for this telco until further notice. Apologies!
EarnScreen.customMessages.invalidIpMetad:
We're experiencing an attack from users with this IP.
We've disabled rewards for this IP until further notice. Apologies!
EarnScreen.customMessages.oneSectionADay: You can only do one section per day while earning sats rewards.

SendBitcoinConfirmationScreen.invoiceAlr: This invoice has already been paid
SendBitcoinConfirmationScreen.paymentAlr:
Payment already attempted.

If you want to send this payment again, start from scratch.
SendBitcoinDestinationScreen.confirmUser: You've never sent money to this address
Please make sure the recipient gave you a {bankName: string} address,
not a username from another wallet.

Otherwise, the money will go to a {bankName: string} Account that has the “{lnAddress: string}” address.

Check the spelling of the first part of the address as well. e.g. jackie and jack1e are 2 different addresses
If the {bankName: string} address is entered incorrectly, {bankName: string} can't undo the transaction.
SendBitcoinDestinationScreen.phoneNotAll: This field does not accept phone numbers
SendBitcoinScreen.willBeSentToMempoolBy: Transaction should be submitted to mempool
SendBitcoinScreen.confirmFeesModal.title: High fee alert!
SendBitcoinScreen.confirmFeesModal.conte:
Your fee is more than 50% bigger than the amount sent. Are you sure you want to proceed?

To reduce fees, ask the receiver to accept transaction via Lightning
SendBitcoinScreen.pendingPayment:
The payment has been sent, but hasn't confirmed yet.

It's possible the payment will not confirm, in which case the funds will be returned to your account.
SendBitcoinScreen.pendingDecryptionMessa: Encrypted message. Waiting for payment confirmation.

Make sure you have access to sign in again in the future.

support.deleteAccountWarning:
Attention: Account deletion is permanent!
Make sure wallets have no funds before deleting.
Deleted account cannot be reinstated.
Circles.learnMore: Learn more about Adopting Bitcoin at
Circles.mayChallenge.title: May Challenge!
Circles.mayChallenge.description: Grow your inner circle by 6 for a chance to win a set of Pizzas on your next Bitcoin Meetup.
Circles.mayChallenge.details:
Want a Bitcoin Pizza Day Party?

Expand your Inner Circle by 6 for a shot at winning a set of pizzas for your next Bitcoin Meetup. The challenge wraps up on May 15th.

Share your circles on social with the hashtag #blinkcircles to participate.

The prize is $150 for pizzas.
Circles.juneChallenge.title: June Challenge!
Circles.juneChallenge.description: Expand your Inner Circle by 10 for a chance to win a $1000 privilege ticket to the Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador
Circles.juneChallenge.details:
Win a privilege ticket to Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador

Expand your Inner Circle by 10 for a chance to win a $1000 privilege ticket to Adopting Bitcoin El Salvador! The ticket includes exclusive access to the main conference, mezzanine with food/drinks/snacks, speakers' dinner, and the Film Festival.

Share your circles on social with the hashtag #blinkcircles to participate.

This time, there will be two winners!
